actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the deduction allowable for certain moving expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to remove dollar limitations on the allowable amount of the income tax deduction for moving expenses incurred in connection with the sale or purchase of a residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the deduction allowable for certain moving expenses.
